headline: JPMorgan Chase Payment Upgrade And Valuation After Phixius Integration
summary: JPMorgan Chase has integrated Phixius account validation into its Kinexys Liink blockchain powered payments network. The move enables near real time account validation using multiple trusted data sources for cross border payments. The integration is aimed at reducing payment errors, limiting fraud risks and improving operational efficiency for network participants. For investors watching NYSE:JPM, this update sits alongside a current share price of $322.4 and a 1 year return of 19.3%. Over...
